column2: Okay, a deal's a deal. Here's what I can do for you. I only work with identified and uncursed items.\n\n_Current Favor: %d_
column3: 好吧，按之前说好的，我得帮你做点事。我干活只收鉴定过还没诅咒的物品。\n\n_当前人情：%d_

column2: _Pickaxe (%d favor):_ I guess I can give you the pickaxe back if you want. I've got plenty more.
column3: _镐子(%d人情)：_你想要的话，这镐子可以给你。毕竟我有的是。

column2: You sure you want dis old thing? The rock around here isn't soft like in the mine, so you won't be able to do any more digging with it.
column3: 你真想要这个破烂吗？这里的石头可不像矿井里的，你没法再拿它挖墙了。

column2: Eh, you did a pretty good job, I'll give it to you for free.
column3: 行，你干的不错，这个破烂白送你了。

column2: _Reforge (%d favor):_ I can reforge two of the same type of item into one of a higher quality.
column3: _重铸(%d人情)：_我可以重铸两件同种物品制成一件品质更好的。

column2: _Harden (%d favor):_ I can harden a weapon or armor, so it's easier to keep an enchantment or glyph.
column3: _硬化(%d人情)：_我可以硬化你的武器护甲，上面的附魔刻印会更容易保留。

column2: _Upgrade (%d favor):_ If you've got an item below +2 I can upgrade it for you.
column3: _升级(%d人情)：_如果你有+2以下的物品，我可以帮你给它升级一下。

column2: _Smith (%d favor):_ I can try forging a weapon or armor for you from scratch. It'll be higher tier and probably upgraded, and you'll get some choice over what you get.
column3: _锻造(%d人情)：_我可以帮你锻造一件武器或护甲。锻造出来的装备不仅高阶还可能带有升级，你还可以挑选一下你想要的装备。

column2: Alright, I'll get the forge warmed up and then you can pick what you want.
column3: 行，我先把锻炉预热一下，然后你就能挑选你想要的装备了。

column2: _Cash Out (all favor):_ I can just give you some regular gold I've got lyin' around. 1 for each point of favor.
column3: _折现(全部人情)：_我可以给你点我平时捡到的金币，一点人情一枚金币。

column2: Okay so that's %d gold. I'm not doin' any more work for you after dis though!
column3: 行，这是%d金币。之后你就别再来找我干活了！

column2: Okay, I can reforge two identified items of the same type. The weaker one will be destroyed to give the stronger one an upgrade. If they're the same level, I'll keep the one on the left.
column3: 行，我可以重铸两件鉴定过的同种物品。较差的那件会报废以升级更好的那件。要是它们等级都一样，我会保留左侧槽位那件。

column2: Okay, here's what I can make. I've already got the forge fired up so choose quickly.
column3: 行，这些就是我能锻造的装备了。锻炉已经烧热了，所以你赶紧给我选。

column2: The crown glows as it rests on your head, and both it and your armor become hot to the touch. You can feel the magic of the crown begin to act on your armor, but it must be directed. Which armor ability do you choose?
column3: 手指还未离开，头顶上的皇冠就开始与你的护甲共鸣，发光、发热，好像坐上你的颅骨就是它的创造使命。皇冠的魔力包覆起你的护甲，摩挲起你的意志，像等待帝王下旨的臣子。陛下，哪项护甲技能更合圣意？

column2: Choose an ability for your armor!
column3: 请陛下选一项护甲技能！

column2: Are you sure you want to choose this ability?
column3: 陛下确定要选择这项技能吗？

column2: As the mask fits over your face, your eyesight fades and visions of new power flood into your mind. How will you direct the mask's power?
column3: 面具激动地贴附到你的脸上。忽然，眼前的景象极速消逝，你什么都看不见了——不，是什么都看得见了，林林总总的新技巧和新能力灌入你的脑海，斑斓琳琅。您想要如何驾驭面具的魔力？

column2: Are you sure you want to choose this subclass?
column3: 您确定要选择这条专精道路吗？

column2: Select a spell to cast it, right click for info or to set a spell to quick cast.
column3: 选择一个要施放的法术，右键单击获取信息或为法术设置快捷施法。

column2: Select a spell to cast it, long press to set a spell to quick cast, or press the info button to switch to info mode.
column3: 选择一个要施放的法术，长按为法术设置快捷施法，或按信息按钮切换为信息模式。

column2: Select a spell to learn about it, or press the holy tome button to switch to cast mode.
column3: 选择一个要了解的法术，或按圣典按钮切换为施法模式。

column2: Are you sure you want to delete this save?
column3: 你确定要删除这个存档吗？

column2: All progress on this game will be lost
column3: 你将失去这局游戏的所有进度

column2: The hero gains one talent point each time they level up. Higher tier talents appear after defeating the second boss.
column3: 英雄在升级时会获得一点天赋点数。更高阶的天赋在击杀第二个Boss后才会解锁。

column2: A subclass can be chosen after defeating the second boss.
column3: 击杀第二个Boss后可以选择一种职业专精。

column2: An armor ability can be chosen after defeating the fourth boss.
column3: 击杀第四个Boss后可以选择一项护甲技能。

column2: Oh yes! You are my hero!\nRegarding your reward, I don't have cash with me right now, but I have something better for you. This is my family heirloom ring: my granddad took it off a dead paladin's finger.
column3: 哦太棒了！你简直就是我的英雄！\n关于你的奖励，我现在没带钱，但我这有个更好的东西。这个戒指是我们的传家宝物，是我爷爷从一个死掉的圣骑士手上摘下来的。
这里没什么有趣的东西。

column2: This trap is inactive, and can no longer be triggered.
column3: 这个陷阱已经失效了，且不会被再次触发。

column2: As you journey through the dungeon, you will automatically record noteworthy things here.
column3: 随着你在地牢中的旅途逐渐推进，这里会自动为你记录下重要信息。

column2: You haven't found and identified that item in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中发现并鉴定过这种物品。

column2: You haven't found and identified a weapon with that enchantment in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中发现并鉴定过带有这种附魔的武器。

column2: You haven't found and identified an armor with that glyph in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中发现并鉴定过带有这种刻印的护甲。

column2: You haven't defeated this enemy in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中击败过这种敌人。

column2: You haven't encountered this character in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中遇见过这个角色。

column2: You haven't examined or triggered this trap in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中检查或触发过这种陷阱。

column2: You haven't examined or trampled this plant in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中检查或践踏过这种植物。

column2: You have upgraded this item a total of _%,d_ times.
column3: 你已经升级了这种物品共计_%,d_次。

column2: You have crafted or upgraded this item a total of _%,d_ times.
column3: 你已经合成或升级了这种物品共计_%,d_次。

column2: You have used this item a total of _%,d_ times.
column3: 你已经使用了这种物品共计_%,d_次。

column2: You have spent a total of _%,d_ gold.
column3: 你已经花费了共计_%,d_枚金币。

column2: You have used a total of _%,d_ energy crystals.
column3: 你已经使用了共计_%,d_个能量晶体。

column2: You have defeated this enemy a total of _%,d_ times.
column3: 你已经击败了这种敌人共计_%,d_次。

column2: You have triggered this trap a total of _%,d_ times.
column3: 你已经触发了这种陷阱共计_%,d_次。

column2: You have trampled this plant a total of _%,d_ times.
column3: 你已经践踏了这种植物共计_%,d_次。

column2: You haven't found this lore text in any of your runs yet.
column3: 你还没在任何一局游戏中发现过这段背景故事。

column2: The left stick moves your character\nThe right stick controls an on-screen pointer
column3: 使用左摇杆移动你的角色\n使用右摇杆移动光标
下一个目标/下一个表标签

column2: Press a key to change the first key binding for: _%s_.
column3: 按下一个按键以替代_%s_的第一键位。

column2: Press a key to change the second key binding for: _%s_.
column3: 按下一个按键以替代_%s_的第二键位。

column2: Press a key to change the third key binding for: _%s_.
column3: 按下一个按键以替代_%s_的第三键位。

column2: This key will be unbound from _%s_.
column3: 这个按键将不再应用于_%s_。

column2: This key is already bound to this action.
column3: 这个按键已经应用于该行动。

column2: You must have at least one key bound to this action.
column3: 至少要有一个键位对应此行动。

column2: Would you like to use the dungeon seed from this ranking as a custom seed for a new game? _Note that games with a custom seed cannot earn badges or contribute to games played, and appear at the bottom of the rankings page._\n\nIf this ranking is for an old run, also note that different versions of Shattered Pixel Dungeon may make different dungeons even if the seed is the same.
column3: 你确定要使用这条记录对应的地牢种子开始一场游戏吗？_注意，使用自定义种子的游戏不能获得徽章，不计入已进行的游戏，也不会出现在排行榜的底部。_\n\n如果这个排名来自较早的游戏，也要注意不同版本的《破碎的像素地牢》可能会生成不同的地牢，即使使用相同的种子。

column2: As you perish you can feel your ankh guiding your spirit back toward this world. It's giving you another chance to conquer the dungeon!\n\nYou can bring two of your items with you, but the rest will be left where you perished. Which items will you choose?
column3:
死亡正在降临，所幸重生十字架正努力引导你的灵魂回到这个世界。这给了你又一个征服地牢的机会！

你可以保留两件物品，而其余物品将会留在你死去的地方。
请做出选择吧。

column2: You haven't selected two items. Are you sure you want to resurrect without two items?
column3: 你还没有选定两件物品。你确定要放弃保留两件物品并重生吗？

column2: Thank you, that horrid rat is slain and I can finally rest... I wonder what twisted magic created such a foul creature...
column3: 谢谢你，那个可怕的老鼠被杀，我也终于可以安息了...不知道究竟是什么样畸形的魔法才能创造这样一个肮脏的生物...

column2: Thank you, that scheming gnoll is slain and I can finally rest... I wonder what twisted magic made it so smart...
column3: 谢谢你，那个诡计多端的豺狼人被杀，我也终于可以安息了...不知道究竟是什么样畸形的魔法使它如此诡诈...

column2: Thank you, that giant crab is slain and I can finally rest... I wonder what twisted magic allowed it to live so long...
column3: 谢谢你，那只巨蟹被杀，我也终于可以安息了...不知道究竟是什么样畸形的魔法能让它活得那么长久...

column2: Please take one of these items, they are useless to me now... Maybe they will help you in your journey...\n\nAlso... There is an item lost in this dungeon that is very dear to me... If you ever... find my... rose......
column3: 挑一个你喜欢的拿走吧，我再也用不着它们了...希望它们能帮助你继续走下去...\n\n还有...我在这地牢里弄丢了一件心爱之物...如果你能...找到那...玫瑰...

column2: Based on maximum depth and hero level.
column3: 基于最深层数与英雄等级。

column2: Based on gold collected and held item value.
column3: 基于收集的金币与随身物品的价值。

column2: Based on floors with all items found, all secrets found, and all puzzles solved.
column3: 基于完全收集物品，发现所有秘密，并且解开所有谜题的楼层数量。

column2: Based on bosses defeated, reduced by standing in avoidable attacks during boss fights.
column3: 基于击败的Boss数量，承受Boss战中可避免的伤害会降低该项得分。

column2: Games started prior to v1.3 have fewer scoring categories, but progression is ~50% larger and treasure has a higher cap
column3: 在v1.3版本之前开始的游戏得分项目较少，但来自进度项目的得分会增加约50%，并且来自寻宝项目的得分上限也会增加。

column2:
Power Saver mode draws the game at a reduced size and scales it up to fit your screen.

This will make graphics less crisp and enlarge the UI slightly, but will also improve performance and battery life.

You may need to restart the game for changes to take effect.
column3:
省电模式会减少游戏的分辨率，同时也能使其和你的设备屏幕相衬。

这会让游戏画面稍显扭曲并且增大用户界面的大小，但这样能够提高游戏效能和电池寿命。

你需要重启游戏使此设定生效。

column2: Shows 3 quickslots with a 'swapper' button if there isn't enough room to display all six quickslots.
column3: 当空间不足以显示所有6个快捷栏的时候，通过“切换快捷栏”按钮可以交替显示另外3个快捷栏。

column2: This language has been fully translated and reviewed.
column3: 这个语言已被完全翻译并审核完毕。

column2: _This language has not yet been reviewed._ It may contain errors, but all text has been translated.
column3: _这个语言尚未被完全审核。_它也许还存在一些问题，不过所有的文本都已被翻译。

column2: _This language has not been fully translated._ Large amounts of text may still be in English.
column3: _这个语言尚未被完全翻译。_大量文本可能仍然为英语。

column2: All translation provided by volunteers through _Transifex._
column3: 所有翻译都由_Transifex_网站上的志愿者提供。

column2: Hello, I hope you're enjoying Shattered Pixel Dungeon!
column3: 欢迎~希望您能在破碎的像素地牢中玩得开心！
以%1$d%%成功率偷窃\n消耗%2$d充能

column2: Your armband does not have enough charge to guarantee stealing this item. If it fails, the shop will close. Are you sure you want to attempt to steal?
column3: 你的袖章充能无法保证稳妥地窃取这件道具。一旦失败，店主就会关店跑路。你确定要尝试继续窃取吗？

column2: Upgrading an item permanently improves it:
column3: 升级这件物品会永久提升其如下属性：
你还有_%d个_可用的升级用物品。

column2: You don't know the properties of this item, its un-upgraded state is shown here.
column3: 你并不知道这件物品的属性，此处显示的是其未被升级的状态。

column2: You don't know what this ring's effect is, and so have no idea what upgrading it will do.
column3: 你并不知道这枚戒指的效果，因此无从得知升级对其有何作用。

column2: Upgrading this item also has a 33% chance to cleanse its curse.
column3: 升级这件物品还有33%的概率净化其诅咒。

column2: Upgrading this item will also weaken its curse, and has a 33% chance to cleanse it entirely.
column3: 升级这件物品不仅会弱化其诅咒，还有33%的概率完全净化其诅咒。

column2: If the curse is cleansed, the item will no longer benefit from curse infusion!
column3: 如果诅咒被净化，这件物品将会不再带有诅咒菱晶的升级效果！

column2: Upgrading this item also has a %d%% chance to destroy its enchantment!
column3: 升级这件物品还有%d%%的概率消除其附魔！

column2: Upgrading this item also has a %d%% chance to destroy its glyph!
column3: 升级这件物品还有%d%%的概率消除其刻印！

column2: Upgrading this item also has a %d%% chance to break its hardening!
column3: 升级这件物品还有%d%%的概率消除其硬化！

column2: This wand has been enhanced with arcane resin, normal upgrades will override resin upgrades!
column3: 这根法杖已被奥术树脂强化，一般的升级效果将会覆盖树脂的升级效果！

column2: Congratulations on conquering the dungeon! You've unlocked some new features that are available when choosing a hero:
column3: 恭喜您征服了这座地牢！新的游戏选项已经解锁，你可以在选择英雄时查看并设置：

column2: You can now enable _challenges!_ These are optional modifiers to make the game more difficult in a variety of ways.
column3: 您现在可以开启_挑战_功能了！挑战是一类通过各种方式为游戏增添难度的设置选项。

column2: You can now enter _custom seeds!_ The same seed and game version always produce the same dungeon.
column3: 您现在可以使用_自定义种子_进行游戏了！在版本不变的情况下，使用同一个种子将总是生成相同的地牢。

column2: You can now participate in _daily runs!_ Every day there's a new daily run that's the same for every player!
column3: 您现在可以参与_每日挑战_了！每天都有一场新游戏，对每个人都是一样的！

column2: Thank you so much for playing Shattered Pixel Dungeon!
column3: 万分感谢您能游玩破碎的像素地牢！

column2: If you haven't already, _please consider supporting the game._ Support from dedicated players lets the developer continue improving the game!
column3: _请考虑赞助这款游戏_，如果您还没有的话。忠实玩家的支持能让开发者不断对游戏进行打磨！

column2: Oh, I see you have the dust! Don't worry about the wraiths, I can deal with them. As I promised, you can choose one of my high quality wands.
column3: 哦，我注意到你已经获得了尸尘！别担心那些怨灵，我能解决它们。就像我承诺的，你可以选择我制作的一根高品质法杖。

column2: Oh, I see you have the embers! I do hope the fire elemental wasn't too much trouble. As I promised, you can choose one of my high quality wands.
column3: 哦，我注意到你已经获得了余烬！希望那个火焰元素没有造成太多麻烦。就像我承诺的，你可以选择我制作的一根高品质法杖。

column2: Oh, I see you have the berry! I do hope the rotberry plant didn't trouble you too much. As I promised, you can choose one of my high quality wands.
column3: 哦，我注意到你已经获得了腐莓！希望那株植物没有对你造成太多困扰。就像我承诺的，你可以选择我制作的一根高品质法杖。测试22
